> StarFlier::
> 
> She looked at Sonic Storm and then to Perceptor. "Uh, add 
something 
> to my form? I can train. Training programs are nothing new. Well, 
> they are in a way. But it's ok to introduce a training program. 
It's 
> the adding things to me that I am not sre of. Could you explain 
that 
> a little more?"  She took her glass of energon and drank form it. 
Her 
> optics flashed brightly as the energy filled her power 
cells. "Hmm, 
> tastey."  Her green scales shimmered for a moment, as they infused 
> the energy into them. Her wings shined and shimmered. She flexed 
them 
> and then refolded them behind her back. "Oh, that is good stuff."
>
